meanings.definition: To apply a new layer of gloss to something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys reglossing her nails to make them shiny.
meanings.sent2: I will regloss the table to make it look new again.
meanings.sent3: After reglossing the floor, it was so shiny that she could see her reflection.
meanings.sent4: The artist reglossed the painting, making the colors pop.
meanings.sent5: Reglossing the car made it sparkle in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The act of restoring the shine or luster to a surface by applying a new coat of gloss.
meanings.sent1: The reglossing of the furniture made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: I need to do a reglossing of the floor to make it shiny again.
meanings.sent3: The reglossing of the statue made it gleam like gold.
meanings.sent4: The reglossing of the book cover made it stand out on the shelf.
meanings.sent5: Her reglossing of the jewelry box made it sparkle like diamonds.
